attributes.action: Prosecute all civil servants involved the loss of the child benefit database from HMRC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the loss of the entire child benefit data the only acceptable resolution is for all individuals involved to be prosecuted under applicable civil and criminal statutes. 

Further we believe this data loss fundamentally removes any credibility to the government claim to be able to securely administer a national identity register.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
